select * from (select rownum rn,a.id,b.REALNAME,b.sex,b.idnumber,c.telephone,a.MONEY,d.ITEM purpose,e.item longtime,a.TOTALPRICE,a.STATUS,f.item marriage,g.item academic,h.item income,a.HOUSINGQUANTITY,a.remark,a.firstinc,to_char(firstinctime,'yyyy/mm/dd') as firstinctime,a.firstincname,a.secondinc,to_char(secondtime,'yyyy/mm/dd') as secondtime,a.secondincname from TB_BORROW a join TB_REALNAME b on a.REALID=b.ID join tb_user c on c.userid=b.userid join tb_systemcategoryitem d on a.purpose = d.id join tb_systemcategoryitem e on a.longtime=e.id join tb_systemcategoryitem f on b.marriage=f.id join tb_systemcategoryitem g on b.ACADEMIC=g.id join tb_systemcategoryitem h on b.INCOME=h.id where rownum < #{end} ) i where i.rn >#{start} and status=21
and i.realname like '%'||#{realname}||'%'
select count(*) from tb_borrow where status=21
